text: aa21 Labs is on a mission to transform
the way people read and write and we
think that using generative AI we can
really change the way we read and
rewrite anywhere whether it's emails
documents or anything else the AI 21
Labs builds we build our own language
models so these are huge neural networks
with billions and hundreds of billions
of parameters and training them is a
huge challenge we use distributed
training on Amazon sagemaker to train
our language models we leveraged a
number of important features that
sagemaker has that help you accomplish
distributed training in a very easy way
training Jurassic 1 Grande our 17
billion parameter language model we had
a number of considerations that we had
in mind so a combination of price
obviously as well as ease of use and
availability of compute and Amazon
sagemaker was a good combination of all
three in one package so we could run our
high performance very challenging
training run quite easily six months
after we first deployed this model in
production and we see that around
two-thirds of our overall traffic uses
this model and we have many customers
who have transitioned completely from
other models to Grande because of the
good trade-off that it offers between
quality and cost
foreign
